name: dms-qa
description: DMS质量管理系统 - 生产异常管理与数据分析平台

scripts.setup: npm run check-env && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run check-env && concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.build: echo 'Building DMS-QA Project...' && cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build && echo 'Build completed successfully!'
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/package-lock.json server/node_modules server/package-lock.json frontend/dist
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm run setup
